Projects.information: NAT network for the raspberry pi that utilizes wlan0 as it's external facing ip interface and eth0 as its internal ip interface.

Projects.Name: Winter's Method
Projects.information: A Time series machine learning model that uses the winter's statistical forecast method for bus data to calcualte accurate run times

Projects.Name: Covid Reporting Tool
Projects.information: A full stack development that allows Clinical lab scientists to upload the generated covid report of the patient to the site securely through sending generated random token via email and their phone number to be viewed and the pdf of patient results are removed from the site access within 2 weeks.
